item.title: CVE-2024-43239|2024-08-19T13:36:42.684Z -- masteriyo -- masteriyo%20-%20lms
item.description: Authorization Bypass Through User-Controlled Key vulnerability in Masteriyo Masteriyo - LMS.This issue affects Masteriyo - LMS: from n/a through 1.11.4.
